channel.title: Cybersecurity on Ram's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Ram's Website

item.title: Building a Python Keylogger: A Security Researcherâ€™s development to Understanding Keystroke Logging
item.description: A step-by-step writeup to building a Python-based keylogger, designed for ethical security researchers to understand how keystroke logging works, and best practices for staying within legal boundaries.

item.title: JSMON: Revolutionizing JavaScript Security Monitoring
item.description: An in-depth look at JSMON, a comprehensive JavaScript security monitoring platform for security enthusiasts and enterprises.

item.title: Intercepting Mobile Calls: A Deep Dive into Threats to National Security
item.description: An in-depth analysis of how mobile call interception through cell phone towers, home networks, and radio communications poses significant threats to national security.
